Daniel Turner: Carbon tax is a bad idea that would hurt our economy and destroy jobs The absolute last thing our country needs is a new tax that would slow our economic recovery and hiring. James Baker, George Shultz, Ted Halstead: Carbon fee needed to combat climate change We support a revenue-neutral national carbon fee that cuts U.S. carbon dioxide emissions in half by 2035 and returns all the revenues raised directly to all Americans.
